articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Mask-free and 'low risk', Italy welcomes milestone - New Straits Times
articles.description: ROME: All of Italy became a mask-free, "low-risk" zone for coronavirus Monday, marking a dramatic milestone for the first European country to be hit by the global pandemic in February 2020.
